content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron plate mine at position(4.0, -60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position=Position(x=4.0, y=-60.0)

### Iron chest at position(4.5, -58.5)
Consists of following entities
- Iron chest (position=Position(x=4.5, y=-58.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items with missing ingredients
- Ensure you have all the required ingredients before attempting to craft an item. In this case, the agent is trying to craft `iron-chest` without enough `iron-plate`. Smelt iron ore in a furnace to produce iron plates.
- Check the recipe for the item you are trying to craft to see what ingredients are needed.

## NAMESPACE
